Samuel Tseng

0177 3203241      samueltseng@icloud.com      Alice-Berend-Straße 3, 10557 Berlin 

Proﬁle 

Data Consultant with Mathematics background and Financial working experience, enjoy learning 
and sharing machine learning and deep learning topics at work and community. Focused on time 
series data, using fraud detection to analysis costumer’s conversion rate recently. Developed with 
Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, Scrapy and MongoDB. 

Objective 

Looking for a full-time position in Berlin. To leverage my years of ﬁnancial industry experience and 
skill in data analysis, accompany with feature engineering, visualization (EDA) and presentation skill 
into a Data Analyst/Scientist role for your company. 

Achievements and Skills 

1. Dealing with hundred of business loan projects: Besides of customer development and 

maintenance, handled credit and ﬁnancial review of each cases. Use the Kan-Ban Management to 
make the project smoothly, total amount of loan I’ve dealt with that achieved 150 million NTD (about 
4.5 million Euro). 

2. Co-founding the AIA-Kaggle community after graduated from Taiwan AI Academy: Solving and 

discussing Kaggle competitions through the monthly reunions, use to sharpen my skills of coding, 
focus on processing of various data. 

3. Familiar with every step in project of data analyse: Using Scrapy and MongoDB to create database, 

Scikit-Learn to analyse data and create model by Keras. Passionate on time series, text data. 

Experience 
DATA CONSULTANT, FREELANCER; 
BERLIN, GERMANY — DEC 2017 - PRESENT 
Skills: Machine Learning, Python, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib, NLTK, Keras, Git, Docker, MongoDB. 

1. Mandarin (zh-tw) News Corpus Dataset: Building a dataset by crawling news from several Taiwanese 

famous online news website, use Scrapy, MongoDB, Docker and Pandas to set up spiders and the 
pipeline for database. This project has still updated continually to increase new spiders, clean and 
extract text data needed. 

2. Costumer’s Convertion Rate Analysis: To realize what makes users convert, like buying a voucher 
when they get an offer. I create feature that extract from user and offer, then some features might 
have higher frequencies of vouchers' payment, and I wish to add that information so that calculate 
the conﬁdence rate next. Using Extreme Gradient Boosting to create model, then print the feature 
importance by weight, gain, and cover to analysis which feature important is. 

3. Sentiment Analysis: Training by the text from Twitter Corpus and news’ data from BBC, CNN, etc. to 
analysis customer’s convert ratio, based on Twitter Sentiment Analysis Training Corpus and clients’ 
data, using Pandas, NLTK, scikit-learn, Scrapy modules and MongoDB database to achieve it.

SPECIALIST (SALES REPRESENTATIVE OF CORPORATE FINANCIAL), CHAILEASE FINANCE CO., LTD; 
TAIPEI, TAIWAN — MAY 2015 - SEP 2017 
Skills: Business Development, Business Negotiation, Financial Analysis, Kan-Ban Management.  

1. My main duty is developing the market of business loan, service of installment and equipment 

leasing service. The amount of business performance is about 1.4 million EUR, 2.3 million EUR and 
0.8 million EUR in 2015, 2016 and 2017 respectively. 

2. A client, a project. Entire business process requires a good project management approach, I use 

Kan-Ban to manage all my projects. The process is divided into the following stages, credit 
information review, ﬁnancial statement analysis, writing credit report, negotiate with authorized 
supervisor and clients, approval or decline, by the end of signing the contract. The average number 
per-month of the projects I deal with is 4, and the rate of approval is about 80%. 

3. Seeking different industry cooperation, inquiry business opportunity during development process. 

Volunteer Experience 
TUTOR, CODEDOOR.ORG; 
BERLIN, GERMANY — OCT 2018 - PRESENT 

Be a Machine Learning mentor in this project held by CodeDoor, provide basic Machine Learning 
consultant. CodeDoor is a non-proﬁt organization that provides refugees and migrants the 
opportunity to learn to code. Participants receive a scholarship backed by silicon valley companies 
and enter a network of like-minded developers and companies. 

Education 
POSTGRADUATE, TAIWAN AI ACADEMY, ACADEMIA SINICA; 
TAIPEI, TAIWAN — JAN 2018 - APR 2018 

The bootcamp held by Taiwan AI Academy, Academia Sinica. It covers Machine Learning and Deep 
Learning in depth through theory to practice. The course included from basic Python instruction to 
advanced, like NLP, image classiﬁcation, etc. All learners in bootcamp can choose one or two topics 
to dig into if you want. By the end of the term, all participants need to build a team and access 
hands-on projects to deal with real issue from partner companies/organization. 
• Group Project: Detect Human-Object Interaction - Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd 
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE, APPLIED MATHEMATICS, UNIVERSITY OF KAOHSIUNG; 
KAOHSIUNG, TAIWAN — SEP 2006 - JUN 2010 

1. Probability & Statistics 
2. Combinatorial Mathematics 
3. Programming Language(C, C++, R)
